exclusion.criterion: past or present mental disorders: psychotic disorders, mood disorders, including bipolar disorders.

exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has several exclusion criteria, including past or present mental disorders and clinically significant medical illness. She also reports significant improvement of autism symptoms with current medications.
